name: RIO_B4ILE TXURISM 02
description:
Turn on the sound.

Do you know what is a Baile was?
In Rio between 80s and 90s funk partys took over the city. These locations were spread throughout all neighborhoods, mainly in the suburbs.

In the beginning the parties were places of dance competitions, crazy scavenger hunts, competitions between the biggest groups etc.

Over the years, fighting competitions began, huge groups formed a large passage and fought for space, it was violent but always with limits, no one was beaten, it was a back and forth until a group dominates the entire space of the hall.

The entry of factions into these groups took the parties to a dimension of violence, with many murders from different sides.
